import React, { useState, useEffect, FC } from 'react' import '../styles/NavBar.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { faHeart, faCartShopping, faHatWizard, faMagnifyingGlass, faUser, faBars, faX, faHouse, faAngleRight, faShoppingCart } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faWolfPackBattalion } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; // Example import from the brands style import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' interface NavBarProps { windowWidth: number, } const NavBar: FC = ({ windowWidth }) => { const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false) const wishList: number = 10; const shoppingCartList: number = 10 const handleDrawerOpen = () => { setDrawerOpen(true) } const handleDrawerClose = () => { setDrawerOpen(false) } return (
    e.preventDefault()}>Best Sellers e.preventDefault()}>Men e.preventDefault()}>Women e.preventDefault()}>Jewelry

) : (
handleDrawerOpen()}>
)} {windowWidth <= 800 && (

) } export default NavBar
